name: Wisps
description:
Sylvanus releases wisps that seek out nearby allied and enemy gods. Allies are healed and protected while enemies take damage over time.
The initial wisp heals allies and damages enemies for twice the normal amount.
stats: Damage: 10/15/20/25/30 (+10% of your magical power) every 1s for 5s
Heal: 15/20/25/30/35 (+10% of your magical power) every 1s for 5s
